activities: Allegis Global Solutions, Inc. and/or its U.S.-based operations (collectively, "AGS") receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland from the Allegis Global Solutions, Inc. operations in the EU in connection with activities such as:   (1) providing recruiting and staffing services for temporary and permanent placements; (2) providing human capital consulting; (3) providing workforce management solutions; (4) providing recruitment process outsourcing; and (5) processing for purposes consented to by the subjects of the personal information.  AGS may also process personal information regarding current, former, potential and prospective employees (collectively “Personnel”) in connection with AGS’s activities as an employer or potential employer.  AGS processes such personal information in connection with its obligations as an employer and to provide services and benefits to the Personnel.  AGS does not sell personal information.  The personal information received may be stored in the U.S. in support of AGS's staffing and employment services and other business activities.
